mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Jackson, Oliver to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jackson, Oliver
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 2 1861. By Telegraph from Fairmont 1861. Col Ja D Evans has just left en route for Worthington with two 2 pieces of artillery & two hundred 200 men. Nothing reliable from Worthington since morning. O Jackson 26 A 83pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jackson, Oliver
Fairmont, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
